entity_types.name: Person

entity_types.description: Technology developed or used by the company.

examples: Motor Trend's Car of the Year

relation_groups.name: Leadership
relation_groups.description: Relationships of leadership within the company.

relations.name: CEO_OF
relations.description: Indicates a person is the CEO of a company.
relations.detail: Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla.

relation_groups.name: Company_Founding
relation_groups.description: Information about the founding of the company.

relations.description: Indicates a person founded a company.
relations.detail: Tesla was founded by Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning.

relations.name: HEADQUARTERED_IN
relations.description: Indicates where a company is headquartered.
relations.detail: Tesla is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

relations.description: Indicates a company produces a vehicle.

relations.description: Indicates a company produces a technology.

relations.description: Indicates a company produces energy storage solutions.

relation_groups.description: Ownership of technology by the company.

relations.description: Indicates a company owns a technology.

relations.name: LOCATED_IN
relations.description: Indicates where a Gigafactory is located.
relations.detail: A Gigafactory is located in Nevada.

relations.name: AWARDED

relations.detail: Model S was awarded Motor Trend's Car of the Year.
